response.original_title: Gang Of Youths MTV Unplugged – Live In Melbourne
response.overview: This live acoustic set captures Gang of Youths at the first ever Australian edition of the MTV Unplugged format. Recorded on 25 July 2018 at Cobblestone Pavilion in West Melbourne, the band re-imagines songs from their chart-topping 2017 album Go Farther in Lightness plus the EP Let Me Be Clear. With stripped-back arrangements and a live setting, this release gives fans an intimate experience of the band’s dynamic songwriting and emotional breadth.
response.title: Gang Of Youths MTV Unplugged – Live In Melbourne
